item.title: PSA for all mappers and map users: SotM Nigeria is coming up on October 11 - 14 and they still need sponsors. This page has all the details . . . PSA for all mappers and map users: @sotmnigeria is coming up on October 11 - 14 and they still need sponsors. This page has all the details . . . https://2023.stateofthemapnigeria.org/call-for-sponsors/ ...and this video from Unique Mappers Network will inspire you https://m.youtube.com/watch?feature=shared&v=QmYfMfqNJ9M
In just one month, 1426 people donated ‚Ç¨ 50,450 (and change) The average gift was ‚Ç¨ 35.

We saw a big jump in mappers becoming members of the #OSM Foundation, too: 38 new members in July 365 in August! Want to join the movement? Here's how: https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/#Membership-Categories
We need a new two-month giving goal for September 9 - November 9. What should it be? https://supporting.openstreetmap.org ‚Ç¨25,000 ‚Ç¨50,000 ‚Ç¨100,000 other

It's not map data, but we know how data-minded you all, so have a look at these two graphs and tell us what you see: Graph of number of contributions to OSMF fundraising Graph of cumulative number of contributions to OSMF fundraising

Mini giving challenge! To reach ¬£50k in donations by tomorrow (9/9/23) we need about ¬£2200. If you can help us reach this major milestone, please do. No gift is too small https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/ #OpenStreetMap Black text with a faint map. Text says "let's build the map together"

It's now even easier to donate to #OpenStreetMap! Thanks to @grischard (et al.) you can now donate to OSMF via Eurozone Bank Transfers (SEPA)! üí∂üí∂üòäüòä <https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/donate/>

Did you know? The OSM.org CDN handles 2.8 billion map tile image requests *per day*! ü§Øü§Øüó∫üó∫ That's a lot of maps! Checkout how @pnorman and the rest of @osm_tech analyse the log files to learn how OSM.org is used. üåê <https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/pnorman/diary/402291> #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat (Thanks to Fastly for the CDN üôè)

The members of the OpenStreetMap Foundation (OSMF) will vote to elect a new board in December. Voting will start on 2 Dec 2023 and the results will be announced on 9 December 2023, during the 2023 Annual General Meeting. <https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/09/01/osm-foundation-board-elections-2023/>

Look at all the people from all the different countries who have visited https://Supporting.OpenStreetMap.org ! ü§© #OpenStrretMap really is an international project! ü§©ü§©ü§© A screenshot of a web analytics showing many countries, number 1 is USA, 2 is Germany

If you want to feel great about the mapping community, take a look at the comments that our donors are leaving on the #OpenStreetMap donation page. There are so many gifts that you have to page through to see their remarks, but they're there. https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/donate/

The response to our online giving campaign has been extraordinary! As of this morning, 962 people have made donations from all over the world. Let's get to 1000 this week! Give to support #OpenStreetMap and maybe you will be the 1000th donor. link: https://Supporting.OpenStreetMap.org/
We should point out that @Firefishy is the OSMF's Site *Reliability* Engineer. Sorry for the typo! mea culpa.

A great reason donate to OSM is to support OSM's site stability engineer. OSM is the greatest volunteer community of all time (!), but the project is too large not to have a paid admin: https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/ Read about @Firefishy's first year: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/05/22/powering-openstreetmaps-future-a-year-of-improvements-from-openstreetmap-foundations-site-reliability-engineer/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SupportingOSM

The global conference of the OpenStreetMap community, State of the Map (SotM), will be making its way to Nairobi, Kenya from September 6th-8th 2024! <https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/08/14/announcing-state-of-the-map-2024-september-6-to-8-2024-join-us-in-nairobi-and-online/> #OSM #gischat #OpenStreetMap #StateOfTheMap #SotM #sotm2024
Remember you can be https://Supporting.OpenStreetMap.org! Screenshot of the OpenStreetMap Mastodon account profile showing the verificated supporting.osm.org link

OSM is 19 years old: we‚Äôre launching an online fundraising campaign to support its future Blog Post: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/08/09/happy-birthday-openstreetmap-2/ Support here: https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat
It's OpenStreetMap's Birthday today! üéÇü•≥ #HappyBirthdayOSM #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat Graphic with the OSM logo in the middle and various benefits of OSM
Happy 19th Birthday, OpenStreetMap! #OpenStreetMap It's time to celebrate
Do you want to get started mapping into #OpenStreetMap? ü§î Here's some guides! üôÇ https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Beginners%27_guide https://learnosm.org/
